title: Name this font
content:
Anyone (sure there are a lot) who know name of this font??

Tnx

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605062312im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bordeaux_5605.jpg)

 [‹ Need help identifying font. Please](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605062312/http:/typophile.com/node/46015 "Go to previous forum topic") [fat serif typeface ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605062312/http:/typophile.com/node/45976 "Go to next forum topic")
author: super_mrki

comments.content:
Looks like it.  
Tnx Renko, very fast reply...

Umm, wait a minute, Mrki: [Benton sans Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605062312/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/benton_sans_1/) seems to be a better solution. (considering the r …)

I also think this is more like to photo I sent.. First I compared letter “a” but, photo is in low res, so curves aren’t so good to compare...

Tnx again...
